main.name: Parrish Williamson
main.description: Full Stack Developer with an emphasis on Front-End. I provide web/application development, UI/UX designs, intuitive and responsive designs.
main.bio: I'm a creator. I love art in all forms, and I love to express my own creativity from drawing, to music, to clothing. I am an entreprenuer who likes to explore many topics and solutions.

education.description: Fast paced four months of intensive learning various languages and concepts in Software Engineering.
Studied Mechanincal Engineering with an emphasis on Automotive Engineering. Built a collegiate level formula race car for 3.5 years.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
